title: Black Jack: Dr. Pinoko no Mori no Bouken
synopsis: Dr. Black Jack forgot his doctor's bag, and his assistant (plus self-claimed "wife") Pinoko rushed to deliver the bag but found herself lost in the forest. Guided by a butterfly, she found that many animals in the forest are sick or injured, and Pinoko used her knowledge to help those animals.
related_anime: ['Black Jack: Futari no Kuroi Isha', 'Black Jack: Futari no Kuroi Isha - Manner Movie']
staff: [['Tezuka, Osamu', ['Original Creator']], ['Sugino, Akio', ['Animation Director']], ['Seya, Shinji', ['Character Design']]]
